text: Bhanjpur railway station is a railway station on the South Eastern Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Bhanjpur town. Its code is VZR. It has two platforms. Passenger, Express and Superfast trains halt at Bhanjpur railway station. ==Major Trains== * Simlipal Intercity Express ==References== ==See also== * Mayurbhanj district Category:Railway stations in Mayurbhanj district Category:Kharagpur railway division
title: Bhanjpur railway station
